summary: A huge fallen tree that has been taken over by bandits. It is now used as a camp for robbing the merchants and citizens of Riverwood! (REDONE!)
descriptionHtml:
Hi! This is my first sort of ''dungeon'' mod (Its more like a camp than a dungeon :/) It is a small bandit camp. In the camp there are three to four bandits, one of them is the boss, so be ready! It is a good place for new players to get some gear before going off an saving (or destroying) Skyrim! Oh, there is also a hidden secret for you to find! (Its in the images, just look)

How to get there:
Leave Riverwood and follow the road that leads to Whiterun, when you get to the second waterfall you will see a fallen tree, cross that and be ready for a fight!

To be added:
Maybe a secret hatch leading into a cave?
More decoration

Bugs:
Sometimes the bandits will get stuck in a wall, the idiots can't find the way past it (Navmesh)

But....whys is ''refurbished''?
Well, when I uploaded it at first it was pretty barren, the NPC hadn't a clue how to move and it was not even navmeshed, also the textures were a mish mash of random things. But I went a head and made it waaay better! There is now a wall and a few more bandits, as well as the boss. They are also patrolling the place, so be careful! I still need to add a cave under it, but thats a job for another day!
author: XenoChoas
